content: तैजस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [तेजसो विकारः अण्] {@--1@} Bright, splendid, luminous; <ls>U. 2. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Made up or consisting of light; तैजसस्य धनुषः प्रवृत्तये <ls>R. 11. 43.</ls> {@--3@} Metallic. {@--4@} Passionate. {@--5@} Vigorous, energetic. {@--6@} Powerful, intense. --सः The highly refined or subtle essence (Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>). --सं {@--1@} Any metal. {@--2@} Ghee. {@--3@} Intensity, severity. {@--4@} Vigour, energy, might.
